page.title: 04THE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Sir Bruno Welby,Mr Blackburn,Mr Wade,Mr Geeson,Mr Bradley,Mr A Geeson,Mr Cawthra are members of the Parish Council and Mr Dodds is the Clerk. The Parish Council help by giving money to charities and they sort out local affairs -- they do planning permission and lighting faults etc. They usually meet every three months in the Village Hall.They don't meet secretly and when they are going to have a meeting it is posted on the Village Hall board.You are allowed to go in and listen but not speak.Every four years there is an election.They don't wear uniform and have kept records since 1894.Mr Geeson is the chairman and he has been on the Council for forty years.They have had two ladies on the Council. Victoria Gowin Age 10
